title: Drawing, "Imaginary Figure, Clock and Sculpture, for A Gas, Light and Coke Co.", ca. 1935
medium: Graphite, color crayon on thin paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Abstraction of a walking figure, bending towards the right, with pinhead and stick-like arms extended, holding a telescope to an eye which composes the whole head. At right, four statues of draped figures seen in perspective, and between them and the standing figure, a safe with a clock in it. Low horizon line and converging pavement stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Imaginary Figure, Clock and Sculpture, for A Gas, Light and Coke Co.", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Graphite, color crayon on thin paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-910.
